atm.controller

Class IdleTimeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • atm.controller.IdleTimeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class IdleTimeController
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This is the IdelTimeController that monitors the idle time of the user. If the user is idle for too long they are automatically logged out of the system.
    Since:
    2015-03-25
    Author:
    Stacie Christensen

      Run allows runTimer to initiate the timer.

      The runTimer allows the sytem to run the timer for a set amount of time.
